tokyo.image_keywords: tokyo shibuya crossing night tokyo street neon lights tokyo tower cherry blossom

things_to_do.title: Shibuya Crossing Food Tour
things_to_do.subtitle: Navigate the world's busiest intersection, then disappear into hidden alleys
things_to_do.description: The scramble of a thousand footsteps fades as you slip into narrow lanes. Steam rises from ramen bowls. Tiny izakayas hum with quiet laughter. This is Tokyo at street level‚Äîalive, intimate, delicious.
things_to_do.image_keywords: tokyo shibuya crossing night crowd shibuya street food stalls

specific_options.title: Ichiran Ramen Experience
specific_options.description: Solo dining booths, personal attention, perfect tonkotsu broth
specific_options.image_keywords: ichiran ramen shibuya solo booth tokyo

specific_options.title: Takoyaki Stand Tour
specific_options.description: Crispy octopus balls fresh off the griddle, bonito flakes dancing in the heat
specific_options.image_keywords: takoyaki street food tokyo crispy octopus

specific_options.title: Izakaya Hopping
specific_options.description: Tiny bars, cold beer, locals at the counter‚Äîthe real Tokyo nightlife
specific_options.image_keywords: nonbei yokocho tokyo izakaya bar alley night

things_to_do.title: Senso-ji Temple & Asakusa
things_to_do.subtitle: Tokyo's oldest temple, where pilgrims and tourists walk the same path
things_to_do.description: Incense smoke curls upward. Red lanterns glow against morning sky. Nakamise Street hums with vendors selling traditional sweets. Here, old Tokyo persists‚Äîunhurried, reverent, timeless.
things_to_do.image_keywords: tokyo sensoji temple red lantern asakusa nakamise shopping street

specific_options.title: Temple Morning Prayer
specific_options.description: Join monks in chanting as sunrise light filters through temple gates
specific_options.image_keywords: sensoji temple morning prayer tokyo monks

specific_options.title: Nakamise Street Shopping
specific_options.description: 250 meters of tradition‚Äîhandmade crafts, sweet bean cakes, vintage postcards
specific_options.image_keywords: nakamise street asakusa shopping traditional tokyo

specific_options.title: Rickshaw Tour
specific_options.description: Glide through backstreets while your guide shares neighborhood secrets

nearby_cafes: Local tea houses on temple grounds

things_to_do.title: TeamLab Borderless
things_to_do.subtitle: Step into a living digital dreamscape where art flows around you
things_to_do.description: Walls dissolve. Flowers bloom across your feet. Light cascades like water. This isn't a museum‚Äîit's an alternate universe where technology breathes, and wonder is the only rule.
things_to_do.image_keywords: teamlab borderless tokyo digital art odaiba futuristic museum

specific_options.title: Crystal Universe
specific_options.description: Walk among infinite LED lights, creating constellations with your smartphone
specific_options.image_keywords: teamlab crystal universe tokyo led lights infinite

specific_options.title: Forest of Resonating Lamps
specific_options.description: Lanterns glow and ripple outward as you pass, creating waves of light
specific_options.image_keywords: teamlab forest lamps tokyo glowing interactive

specific_options.title: Athletics Forest
specific_options.description: Playful installations that respond to movement‚Äîclimb, jump, slide through art
specific_options.image_keywords: teamlab athletics forest tokyo interactive play

cafes.name: %Arabica Tokyo
cafes.notes: Minimalist specialty coffee with city views

tokyo.description: A city that never sleeps, where vending machines serve hot ramen at 3 AM and serene shrines hide between skyscrapers.

kyoto.image_keywords: kyoto fushimi inari torii gates kyoto bamboo grove arashiyama kyoto geisha gion district

things_to_do.title: Fushimi Inari Shrine Hike
things_to_do.subtitle: Ten thousand vermillion gates lead you up the sacred mountain
things_to_do.description: Each torii gate is a donated prayer. As you climb, the crowd thins. By mid-mountain, there's only birdsong, mossy stone foxes, and endless red tunnels glowing in dappled light.
things_to_do.best_time: Early morning (6-8 AM) or late afternoon
things_to_do.image_keywords: fushimi inari thousand torii gates path kyoto red shrine gates mountain

specific_options.title: Full Mountain Circuit
specific_options.description: Complete the sacred loop to the summit‚Äî4km of gates, forest, and foxes
specific_options.image_keywords: fushimi inari summit hike kyoto mountain torii

specific_options.title: Lower Shrine Tour
specific_options.description: Stay below for the iconic gates and temple complex‚Äîeasier, still magical
specific_options.image_keywords: fushimi inari main shrine kyoto gates entrance

specific_options.title: Sunrise Photography
specific_options.description: Arrive before dawn to catch golden hour light streaming through the gates
specific_options.image_keywords: fushimi inari sunrise golden hour kyoto photography

nearby_cafes: Traditional tea stalls at mountain rest points

things_to_do.title: Arashiyama Bamboo Grove
things_to_do.subtitle: Walk through towering green stalks that creak and whisper in the wind
things_to_do.description: Sunlight filters green. The air cools. Bamboo rises like cathedral columns, swaying, creaking, alive. It's otherworldly‚Äîa forest that feels like walking into a scroll painting.
things_to_do.image_keywords: arashiyama bamboo forest pathway kyoto bamboo grove green light

specific_options.title: Morning Grove Walk
specific_options.description: Stroll the main path before crowds arrive‚Äîserene, silent, surreal
specific_options.image_keywords: arashiyama bamboo pathway morning kyoto quiet empty

specific_options.title: Tenryu-ji Temple Visit
specific_options.description: A UNESCO World Heritage site with a pond garden designed for walking meditation
specific_options.image_keywords: tenryuji temple garden arashiyama kyoto pond zen

specific_options.title: Togetsukyo Bridge
specific_options.description: Cross the iconic wooden bridge over the Katsura River‚Äîmountain views all around
specific_options.image_keywords: togetsukyo bridge arashiyama kyoto river wooden

things_to_do.title: Traditional Tea Ceremony
things_to_do.subtitle: A quiet ritual of matcha, sweets, and centuries of mindfulness
things_to_do.description: You kneel on tatami. A host whisks matcha in slow, deliberate arcs. Each gesture is precise, purposeful. For one hour, the world shrinks to the sound of bamboo on ceramic.
things_to_do.image_keywords: kyoto tea ceremony matcha traditional gion geisha district machiya

specific_options.title: Camellia Tea House
specific_options.description: Intimate ceremony in a restored machiya with English-speaking tea master
specific_options.image_keywords: camellia tea house kyoto ceremony traditional matcha

specific_options.title: En Tea Ceremony
specific_options.description: Held within Kennin-ji Temple grounds‚Äîtemple tour included
specific_options.image_keywords: kennin-ji temple tea ceremony kyoto zen garden

specific_options.title: Machiya Experience
specific_options.description: Private ceremony in a traditional wooden townhouse, Hanamikoji Street setting
specific_options.image_keywords: machiya tea ceremony gion kyoto traditional house

cafes.notes: Iconic coffee spot near Yasaka Pagoda

kyoto.description: Japan's ancient capital where every corner reveals a temple, a garden, or a glimpse of geisha disappearing into wooden teahouses.

osaka.image_keywords: osaka dotonbori neon lights canal osaka castle cherry blossom osaka street food takoyaki

things_to_do.title: Dotonbori Food Street
things_to_do.subtitle: Neon-lit chaos and the best street food in Japan
things_to_do.description: Glowing billboards reflect in the canal. Crowds swarm. The air smells of grilled octopus and fried dough. Welcome to Osaka's kitchen‚Äîloud, delicious, unforgettable.
things_to_do.image_keywords: dotonbori osaka neon signs night osaka street food vendors

things_to_do.title: Osaka Castle & Park
things_to_do.subtitle: Golden castle rising from cherry blossom clouds
things_to_do.description: The castle towers above, regal and gleaming. Below, cherry trees bloom in waves of pink. You walk the grounds, feeling centuries of history beneath your feet.
things_to_do.image_keywords: osaka castle golden architecture osaka castle park cherry blossom

things_to_do.title: Kuromon Ichiba Market
things_to_do.subtitle: The beating heart of Osaka's food scene
things_to_do.description: Vendors call out. Fresh fish glisten on ice. The smell of grilled seafood fills the air. You taste, you explore, you leave full and happy.
things_to_do.image_keywords: kuromon market osaka seafood stalls osaka fresh fish market vendors

osaka.description: Japan's kitchen‚Äîwhere neon-lit streets overflow with takoyaki stands, and locals live to eat, laugh, and celebrate.

japan.description: Where centuries-old temples meet neon-lit streets. A place where precision meets poetry, and every detail tells a story.
japan.best_time: Cherry blossoms in spring (March-April) or autumn foliage (October-November)

things_to_do.title: Surf Lesson at Echo Beach
things_to_do.subtitle: Ride your first wave on Bali's most iconic surf break
things_to_do.description: The ocean roars. Instructors guide you into position. You paddle, pop up, and suddenly‚Äîyou're gliding. The wave carries you, the beach rushes closer, and for ten seconds, everything else disappears.
things_to_do.image_keywords: echo beach canggu surf waves canggu surf school lesson

specific_options.description: Learn the basics in a supportive group‚Äîboard, wetsuit, and encouragement included

specific_options.description: One-on-one instruction for faster progress‚Äîperfect for nervous first-timers

things_to_do.description: You float in an infinity pool, drink in hand, as the sun dips low. Music hums. Palm fronds sway. This is Bali at its most indulgent‚Äîeffortlessly chic, perfectly lazy.

things_to_do.title: Sunset Yoga Session
things_to_do.subtitle: Flow through poses as the sky turns gold over the rice fields

things_to_do.title: Tegalalang Rice Terrace Walk
things_to_do.subtitle: Descend into emerald layers carved by generations of Balinese farmers
things_to_do.description: Mist hangs low in the valley. Rice stalks sway. The terraces cascade like green stairs to the horizon. You walk narrow ridges, palms overhead, and realize this isn't a farm‚Äîit's a living sculpture.
things_to_do.image_keywords: tegalalang rice terrace ubud green layers bali rice paddy terraces morning

specific_options.title: Sunrise Trek

specific_options.description: Taste the world's most expensive coffee (Luwak) and see how it's made

things_to_do.title: Sacred Monkey Forest
things_to_do.subtitle: Ancient temple ruins overtaken by jungle‚Äîand hundreds of curious macaques
things_to_do.description: Monkeys leap between moss-covered statues. Stone temples crumble under vines. The forest feels alive‚Äîplayful, chaotic, deeply spiritual. Watch your sunglasses. They're faster than you think.
